explaination: Negative terms related to personal distress include anxiety, frustration, burnout, isolation, dissatisfaction, helplessness, and emotional pain.
Negative terms include poverty, homelessness, insecurity, inequality, distress, inadequate housing, financial burden, fear, and instability.
Negative terms related to personal distress and economic issues include inequality, exploitation, poverty, instability, injustice, and lack of access.
